name: IVA 22% Pubblica Amministrazione
Usage: Seller doesn’t debit VAT;  public sector customer pays VAT directly to the state

name: IVA 22% Reverse Charge
Usage: Reverse charge mechanism – VAT debited and credited

name: Escluso Art.15
Usage: Penalties, expenses on behalf of customer

name: Esente Art.10
Usage: Customer exempted but both customer and supplier subjects to formal requirements

name: Fuori Campo IVA
Usage: No conditions (personal, object) to apply VAT

name: Cessioni all’esportazione non imponibili art 8 comma 1c (plafond)
Operazioni non imponibili art 7 dpr 633 1972
Usage: Generic – no VAT for territoriality (should be specified)

name: IVA 0 Reverse Charge
Usage: Reverse charge mechanism – seller does not apply VAT
